data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Saint Andrew, Dominica.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Andrew, Dominica

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Saint Andrew, Dominica to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,710 believers in Saint Andrew to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Saint Andrew.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Calibishie
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Calibishie, Saint Andrew, Dominica.
Spirit, help the fearful in Saint Andrew, Dominica to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 9,500 people living in the state of Saint Andrew.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint Andrew, Dominica has a population of 9,500.

We estimate Saint Andrew has 1,710 people who might know Jesus, 7,039 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 751 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Saint Andrew, Dominica.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.
